content: does anyone know who the maintainer is for the netbsd target, if there is someone?
related: I know there's been some discussion about this in the target tier policy, but would it be a good idea to maintain a list of maintainers somewhere?
That's certainly a good idea; the choice of "somewhere" is an open question in the policy RFC
it is an ongoing project to define such lists within the compiler team, fwiw
oh should I re-ask my original question in the compiler team channel?
I doubt anyone there knows, the work is very early days :)
My guess is that we don't have a maintainer
I guess if we can't find someone knowledgeable I'll just modify https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/72696 so it doesn't enable zlib on NetBSD?
but I'm willing to give it a couple more days
@Jethro I would just go ahead and do that now, I think it's fine for us to diverge there.
on NetBSD side, there are jakllsch or ryoon (github accounts) which could be pinged. there are NetBSD developers involved in lang/rust port.
